verbs.description: [ARG0: Donald Trump and Kim Jong - un] [V: signed] [ARG1: a statement] [ARGM-TMP: after their historic meeting in Singapore] [C-ARG1: which declared their desire for a ' lasting and robust peace regime ' on the Korean peninsula] .
